source.query:
SELECT VTWEG AS CODIGO_CANAL_DIST,
 UPPER(VTEXT) AS NOMBRE_CANAL_DIST
FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVTWT"
WHERE MANDT='400' AND SPRAS = 'S'
ORDER BY VTWEG

SELECT	DISTINCT
	A.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO_DIST,
	UPPER(A.NAME1) AS NM_CENTRO_DIST,
	B.WERKS_ECC AS CD_CENTRO_DIST_EQV
FROM "SAPHANADB"."T001W"  A
	 LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZPB_CONV_WERKS"  B ON
		B.WERKS = A.WERKS AND B.MANDT=A.MANDT
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND FABKL = 'ZD'
ORDER BY A.WERKS

SELECT  
	A.KUNNR AS CODIGO_CLIENTE,
    UPPER(A.NAME1) AS NOMBRE_CLIENTE,	
    UPPER(A.NAME2) AS NOMBRE2_CLIENTE,
	C.GERENCIA AS CD_GCIA_VTA
FROM "SAPHANADB"."KNA1" A
		LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZTRUTA_GERENCIA" C ON
			C.ZTP_RUTA = LEFT(A.LZONE,2)
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.LOEVM <> 'X'
	   and A.KTOKD IN('BPLO','BPIN', 'ZDST', 'ZCPD', 'ZGOB','ZE', 'ZITC') 
ORDER BY A.KUNNR

SELECT DISTINCT
	A.KUNNR AS CODIGO_EMPLEADO,
    UPPER(A.NAME1) AS NOMBRE_EMPLEADO 
 FROM SAPHANADB.KNA1 A
		JOIN "SAPHANADB"."KNVV" B ON
			B.KUNNR = A.KUNNR AND 
			B.MANDT = A.MANDT 
 WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S'  AND A.LOEVM <> 'X'  
	   and A.KTOKD IN('ZE')
 ORDER BY A.KUNNR

SELECT DISTINCT
		SUBSTR(A.PRODH,4,3) AS COD_FML_PROD,
		UPPER(A.VTEXT) AS NOM_FML_PROD,
		SUBSTR(A.PRODH,2,2) AS COD_TP_PROD
	FROM "SAPHANADB"."T179T" A
	WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.SPRAS = 'S' AND LEFT(A.PRODH,1) = 'M'
	AND LENGTH(SUBSTR(A.PRODH,4,11)) = 2

	ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PRODH,2,2), SUBSTR(A.PRODH,4,3)

SELECT DISTINCT
	GERENCIA AS CD_GERENCIA_VTAS,
    UPPER(CASE 
				WHEN DESC_GERENCIA = 'LOW RF' THEN 'LOW' 
				WHEN DESC_GERENCIA = 'LOW RA' THEN 'LOW' 
				ELSE DESC_GERENCIA 
			END) AS NOM_GERENCIA_VTAS
FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZTRUTA_GERENCIA" 
ORDER BY GERENCIA

SELECT 
	A.KUNNR AS CD_HOLDING,
	A.NAME1 AS NM_HOLDING 
FROM SAPHANADB.KNA1 A 
WHERE A.KTOKD = '0012' 
	  AND A.LOEVM <> 'X' 
	  AND A.MANDT = '400'

SELECT DISTINCT
   SUBSTR(A.PRODH,6,3) AS COD_LIN_PROD,
   UPPER(A.VTEXT) AS NOM_LIN_PROD,
   SUBSTR(A.PRODH,4,2) AS COD_FLM_PROD
FROM "SAPHANADB"."T179T" A
WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.SPRAS = 'S' AND LENGTH(SUBSTR(A.PRODH,6,11)) = 3 AND LEFT(A.PRODH,1) = 'M'
ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PRODH,4,2),  SUBSTR(A.PRODH,6,3)

SELECT DISTINCT
		SUBSTR(A.PRODH,9,3) AS COD_MARCA_PROD,
		UPPER(A.VTEXT) AS NOM_MARCA_PROD,
		SUBSTR(A.PRODH,6,3) AS COD_LIN_PROD

	FROM "SAPHANADB"."T179T" A 
	WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S' AND
	LENGTH(SUBSTR(A.PRODH,9,11)) = 3 AND LEFT(A.PRODH,1) = 'M'
	ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PRODH,6,3)/*LINEA*/, SUBSTR(A.PRODH,9,3) /*MARCA*/

SELECT 
	WAERS AS CD_MONEDA,
	UPPER(LTEXT) AS NOM_MONEDA
FROM SAPHANADB.TCURT A
WHERE A.MANDT='400'  AND SPRAS = 'S'
ORDER BY WAERS

SELECT DISTINCT
	A.VKORG AS CD_ORG,
	UPPER(A.VTEXT) AS NOM_ORG,
	BUKRS_ECC AS CD_ORG_ANT
FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVKOT" A 
	 LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZPB_CONV_BUKRS" B  ON
		B.BUKRS = A.VKORG AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT
WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.SPRAS = 'S'
ORDER BY A.VKORG

SELECT DISTINCT
       A.MATNR AS CD_PRODUCTO,
       UPPER(A.MAKTX) AS NOMBRE_PRODUCTO, 
       C.CD_MARCA_PROD, 
	   LPAD(B.BISMT,18,'0') AS CD_PRODUCTO_EQV,
	   D.FACTOR_LITROS,
	   D.FACTOR_LIBRAS,
	   D.FACTOR_CAJAS, 
	   D.FACTOR_PALETAS,
	   CASE
	   WHEN C.FML IN('03', '04', '70', '80', '85')
		THEN 'LB'
		ELSE 'L'
	END AS UND_MED
FROM "SAPHANADB"."MAKT" A 
	JOIN "SAPHANADB"."MARA" B ON
		B.MATNR = A.MATNR AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT
	JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT MATERIAL, SUBSTR(PRDHA,9,3) AS CD_MARCA_PROD, SUBSTR(PRDHA,4,2) AS FML	
			FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZCDS_SD_INVOICE"  A
			WHERE A.MANDT= '400'  AND A.PRDHA <> '' ) C ON
		C.MATERIAL = A.MATNR 
	LEFT JOIN (SELECT MATNR, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'L'  THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_LITROS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'LB' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_LIBRAS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'CS' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_CAJAS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'PAL' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_PALETAS 
				FROM "SAPHANADB"."MARM" A 
				WHERE A.MANDT='400'  AND MEINH IN('L', 'CS', 'PAL', 'LB') 
				GROUP BY MATNR
				ORDER BY MATNR
		   ) D ON
		D.MATNR = A.MATNR  
WHERE A.MANDT='400'   AND SPRAS = 'S' 
ORDER BY A.MATNR

SELECT DISTINCT
	BLAND AS CD_PROVINICIA,
	UPPER(BEZEI) AS NOM_PROVINCIA
FROM "SAPHANADB"."T005U" 
WHERE MANDT='400' AND LAND1 = 'DO'
ORDER BY BLAND

SELECT A.KVGR2 AS CD_REGION_VENTA
	,UPPER(A.BEZEI) AS NOM_REGION_VENTA

FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVV2T" A
WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.SPRAS = 'S'

SELECT DISTINCT
	A.VKORG AS CD_ORGANIZACION,
	A.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO,
	A.VKGRP AS CD_ZONA,
	A.ZTP_RUTA AS TIPO_RUTA,
	A.BZIRK AS CD_RUTA,
	COALESCE(B.LTEXT, CONCAT('RUTA ',A.BZIRK)) AS NOM_RUTA,
	B.ROUTE_ECC AS CD_RUTA_ANTERIOR, 
	GERENCIA,
	KUNNR_SUP AS CD_SUPERVISOR
FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA" A
	  LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZPB_CONV_ROUTE"  B ON
		B.ROUTE = A.BZIRK AND
		B.WERKS = A.WERKS AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT
WHERE A.MANDT='400'
ORDER BY A.VKORG, A.WERKS, A.VKGRP, A.ZTP_RUTA, A.BZIRK

SELECT 
	A.MVGR2 AS COD_TEC_PROD,
    UPPER(A.BEZEI) AS NOM_TEC_PROD
FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVM2T"  A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S'  
ORDER BY A.MVGR2
